name: The Stanley Parody
description:
Welcome to the crosshairs of a good old children's fairytale and a cool meta-themed game!
In this 10-minute contraption I invite you to walk Stanley the donkey through a few decisions and ridiculous scenarios; multiple endings and hidden narration included.

Be warned that WebGL sometimes has an issue where mouse movement is jittery while moving. Some textures may also look strange. I thus recommend that you download and play the Windows build for best experience.

But first of all, go ahead and play The Stanley Parable if you haven't already.

This is the second prototype built for Comp3218 Game Design and Development by:

  • Teo Nistor
  • Mircea Mihalea

Let's see how good a mark it gets us.

P.S. It has been brought to my attention that there is a place where you can walk out of the map, so look forward to that if you like to dig for glitches. Hope the lecturers won't find it.
